element.short: Why this structure map is defined
element.definition: Explaination of why this structure map is needed and why it has been designed as it has.
element.comment: This element does not describe the usage of the structure map Instead  it provides traceability of ''why'' the resource is either needed or ''why'' it is defined as it is.  This may be used to point to source materials or specifications that drove the structure of this structure map.
